entities.name: PriceListItem
entities.description: Information about how to price a product in the specified price level, including pricing method, rounding option, and discount type based on a specified product unit.

attributes.name: productPriceLevelId
attributes.description: Unique identifier of the price list.

attributes.name: createdOn
attributes.description: Date and time when the price list was created.

attributes.name: createdBy
attributes.description: Unique identifier of the user who created the price list.

attributes.name: modifiedOn
attributes.description: Date and time when the price list was last modified.

attributes.name: modifiedBy
attributes.description: Unique identifier of the user who last modified the price list.

attributes.name: createdOnBehalfBy
attributes.description: Shows who created the record on behalf of another user.

attributes.name: modifiedOnBehalfBy
attributes.description: Shows who last updated the record on behalf of another user.

attributes.name: versionNumber
attributes.description: Version Number

attributes.name: importSequenceNumber
attributes.description: Sequence number of the import that created this record.

attributes.name: overriddenCreatedOn
attributes.description: Date and time that the record was migrated.

attributes.name: timeZoneRuleVersionNumber
attributes.description: For internal use only.

attributes.name: UTCConversionTimeZoneCode
attributes.description: Time zone code that was in use when the record was created.

attributes.name: processId
attributes.description: Contains the id of the process associated with the entity.

attributes.name: stageId
attributes.description: Contains the id of the stage where the entity is located.

attributes.name: traversedPath
attributes.description: A comma separated list of string values representing the unique identifiers of stages in a Business Process Flow Instance in the order that they occur.

attributes.name: amount
attributes.description: Monetary amount for the price list.

attributes.name: transactionCurrencyId
attributes.description: Choose the local currency for the record to make sure budgets are reported in the correct currency.

attributes.name: exchangeRate
attributes.description: Shows the conversion rate of the record's currency. The exchange rate is used to convert all money fields in the record from the local currency to the system's default currency.

attributes.name: amountBase
attributes.description: Value of the Amount in base currency.

attributes.name: organizationId
attributes.description: Unique identifier of the organization associated with the price list.

attributes.name: percentage
attributes.description: Percentage for the price list.

attributes.name: priceLevelId
attributes.description: Unique identifier of the price level associated with this price list.

attributes.name: pricingMethodCode
attributes.description: Pricing method applied to the price list.

attributes.name: productId
attributes.description: Product associated with the price list.

attributes.name: productNumber
attributes.description: User-defined product number.

attributes.name: quantitySellingCode
attributes.description: Quantity of the product that must be sold for a given price level.

attributes.name: roundingOptionAmount
attributes.description: Rounding option amount for the price list.

attributes.name: roundingOptionAmountBase
attributes.description: Value of the Rounding Amount in base currency.

attributes.name: roundingOptionCode
attributes.description: Option for rounding the price list.

attributes.name: roundingPolicyCode
attributes.description: Policy for rounding the price list.

attributes.name: uoMId
attributes.description: Unique identifier of the unit for the price list.

attributes.name: uoMScheduleId
attributes.description: Unique identifier of the unit schedule for the price list.

attributes.name: discountTypeId
attributes.description: Unique identifier of the discount list associated with the price list.
